about_the_game:
(Release, 2024)

PLOT:

On a forgotten island in the vast ocean, with no connection to the rest of the world. As Nilgo, a ranger responsible for guarding the region, you will need to escape the chaos that has taken place on the island, while surviving by fighting creatures that are beyond the rational understanding of science.

ABOUT THE GAME:

The game is based on classic survival horror games and the gore of the cinematic subgenre of horror/horror films that marked decades.

The game follows the survival of a hero on an island infested with monsters. In the process, the player must manage resources available throughout the scenario to complete his journey while facing the dangers that lurk everywhere.

CHARACTERISTICS:

- Beautiful HD graphics running at 60 frames per second for the first time.

- A complete visual renovation, bringing better graphic quality.

- Optimized for wide screen displays, sharper texts and updated character sprites, scenery and objects in game.

- Support for the Steam platform with Steam Achievements and full controller compatibility.

- This new version for PC will include all the content from previous versions, including support for subtitles in English and Portuguese.
